trans-unit.source: To delete a StorSimple backup policy
trans-unit.target: To delete a StorSimple backup policy

trans-unit.source: On the device **Quick Start** page, click the **Backup Policies** tab.
trans-unit.target: On the device **Quick Start** page, click the **Backup Policies** tab.

trans-unit.source: This will take you to the **Backup Policies** page.
trans-unit.target: This will take you to the **Backup Policies** page.

trans-unit.source: Select the policy by clicking anywhere in the corresponding row except for the first column, and then click **Delete** at the bottom of the page.
trans-unit.target: Select the policy by clicking anywhere in the corresponding row except for the first column, and then click **Delete** at the bottom of the page.

trans-unit.source: You will be prompted for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: You will be prompted for confirmation.

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that deleting a backup policy will delete all the associated backups.
trans-unit.target: Keep in mind that deleting a backup policy will delete all the associated backups.

trans-unit.source: The **Backup Policies** page will be updated to display the new list of policies.
trans-unit.target: The **Backup Policies** page will be updated to display the new list of policies.
